achievements.name: Enemy at the Gates

achievements.name: Can Buy Me Love
achievements.description: Earn Influence by selling 10 items to Enclaves.

achievements.name: That was it? This is easy.
achievements.description: Survive to the second wave in a session of Daybreak.

achievements.name: Magnificent Seven
achievements.description: Survive 7 total zombie waves in Daybreak.

achievements.name: The Pledge
achievements.description: Earn a total of 500 Prestige playing Daybreak.

achievements.name: Day Broken
achievements.description: Achieve victory in a session of Daybreak.

achievements.name: Just a Nibble
achievements.description: Open 0b1111 CLEO Drops.

achievements.name: Sleep All Day, Out All Night
achievements.description: Survive 49 total zombie waves in Daybreak.

achievements.name: Guilty Spark
achievements.description: Survive 343 total zombie waves in Daybreak.

achievements.name: That Byte Looks Infected
achievements.description: Open 0b11111111 CLEO Drops.

achievements.name: The Turn
achievements.description: Earn a total of 5000 Prestige playing Daybreak.

achievements.name: Time's Up
achievements.description: Survive to the fourth wave in a session of Daybreak.

achievements.name: The Infinite Sea
achievements.description: Survive to the sixth wave in a session of Daybreak.

achievements.name: Human Contact
achievements.description: Play Daybreak with another human being.

achievements.name: Never Forget the Medic
achievements.description: Heal the technician 12 times in Daybreak.

achievements.name: We Don't Need No Education
achievements.description: Repair a wall 12 times in Daybreak.

achievements.name: The Moral High Ground is Mine
achievements.description: Reach the fourth wave in a session of Daybreak without any player using guns.

achievements.name: Conservation of Splatter
achievements.description: Reach the fifth wave in a session of Daybreak without any player using explosives.

achievements.name: I Was All By Myself
achievements.description: Reach the sixth wave in a session of Daybreak in single player.

achievements.name: Be My Bodyguard
achievements.description: Reach the third wave in a session of Daybreak without the technician taking damage.

achievements.name: Flawless Victory
achievements.description: Achieve victory in a session of Daybreak without suffering any player deaths.

achievements.name: Forgot My Breaches
achievements.description: Achieve victory in a session of Daybreak without any wall sections being leveled.

achievements.name: Hoard Mode
achievements.description: Achieve victory in a session of Daybreak after collecting 25 CLEO drops.

achievements.name: Get Used to Disappointment
achievements.description: Allow the technician to die during a session of Daybreak.

achievements.name: Green Talon
achievements.description: Fail during the first wave in a session of Daybreak.

achievements.description: Have all four Red Talon facilities in your home community at the same time.

achievements.name: Cargo Cult

achievements.name: No Gut, No Glory
achievements.description: Kill a blood plague juggernaut.

achievements.name: My Own Private Army
achievements.description: Recruit four Red Talon contractors to your home community.

achievements.name: Shut Up
achievements.description: Kill a screamer with a CLEO heavy sniper rifle.

achievements.name: Head to To So Player
achievements.description: Allow 24 bags of dropped items to accumulate on the ground.

achievements.name: Am I the Only One Zen Around Here?
achievements.description: Kill 50 plague zombies with crossbows.

achievements.name: Enjoying Your Stay?

achievements.name: Do Not Go Gentle into That Good Night
achievements.description: Enter a Dread Zone.

achievements.name: Rage Against the Dying of the Light
achievements.description: Enter a Nightmare Zone.

achievements.name: True Grit
achievements.description: Survive until Day 100 while in a Dread Zone or a Nightmare Zone.

achievements.name: Over the Rainbow

achievements.name: Peerless
achievements.description: Kill all plague hearts in a single Nightmare Zone.

achievements.name: The First Hurdle
achievements.description: Destroy a plague heart in a Dread Zone or a Nightmare Zone.

achievements.name: Fly Your Freak Flag
achievements.description: Earn 1000 Influence from killing freaks.

achievements.name: Throw Your Love Around
achievements.description: Reach maximum morale while in a Dread Zone or a Nightmare Zone.

achievements.name: Close Call

achievements.name: Pound of Flesh
achievements.description: Craft a case of bulk plague cure while in a Dread Zone or Nightmare Zone.

achievements.name: Blood Farmer

achievements.name: Is There No One Else
achievements.description: Destroy 100 hordes in Dread Zones or Nightmare Zones.

achievements.name: But It Can Be Better

achievements.name: You're So Fine You Blow My Mind
